```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("TextMessages.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df_long <- df %>% pivot_longer(cols = c(Baseline, Six_months), names_to = "Time", values_to = "Text_Count")

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
ggplot(df_long, aes(x = Time, y = Text_Count, fill = Time)) +
  geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~Group) +
  labs(title = "Text Messages by Group and Time",
       x = "Time Point",
       y = "Number of Text Messages",
       fill = "Group") 
```
